section.20: The Book of Qiyam Al-Lail (The Night Prayer) and Voluntary Prayers During the Day

hadiths.text: It was narrated from Sa'd bin Hisham:That he came to the Mother of the Believers Aishah and asked her about the prayers of the Messenger of Allah (ï·º). She said: "He used to pray eight rak'ahs at night and pray witr with the ninth, then he would pray two rak'ahs sitting down
